definition: paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc

sentences.english: The papyrus was already beginning to crumble, so he did not dare touch it by hand.
sentences.chinese: 這些紙草已經開始碎裂，所以他不敢用手去碰它們。

sentences.english: In those days, paper was made from strips of the papyrus plant.
sentences.chinese: 在那個年代，紙是由植物的莖和紙草製成的。

sentences.english: Sema bound with two plants, the papyrus and the lotus.
sentences.chinese: Sema用兩種植物，紙草和荷花綁紮一起。

sentences.english: For example, in 1835, Smith bought some ancient Egyptian papyruses .
sentences.chinese: 例如，在1835年，史密斯買回了一些古埃及紙草。

sentences.english: In those days, paper was made from strips of the papyrus.
sentences.chinese: 在那個時期，紙張是由紙草植物剝皮製成的。
